verbose_text: Phosphoinositide biphosphate (PIP2) synthesis is downregulated by enzymes including inositol monophosphate phosphatase (IMPase) and inositol polyphosphate phosphatase (IPPase), which are both inhibited by lithium.
evidence: biphosphate (PIP2) synthesis is downregulated by enzymes including inositol monophosphate phosphatase (IMPase) and inositol
